text: Krasny Yar () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Voskresensky Selsoviet, Meleuzovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 1 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 20 km from Meleuz, 12 km from Voskresenskoye. == References == Category:Rural localities in Meleuzovsky District
title: Krasny Yar, Meleuzovsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
